Future Techware Ltd is a Nigerian information technology company. It provides computer training programs, software and web development, networking services, e-commerce integration, and ICT support for individuals, businesses, and institutions.
History
Future Techware Ltd was incorporated in 2017. It began by offering basic IT support and later expanded to include web development, e-payment platforms, and security systems. In August 2025, the company launched free in-app advertisements and a business card sharing feature on its Workio service directory app. In September 2025, it was reported that Workio had begun to gain usage among users in multiple regions of Nigeria. In June 2022, one of the company’s earlier apps, Transpico, was reported to have depreciated in value due to changing usage patterns, prompting the development of a replacement called Transfile.
Services
Future Techware Ltd provides:
* Two-month training courses in computer literacy, programming, networking, graphic design, and database management
* Custom software, websites, blogs, and mobile application development
* LAN/WAN networking, internet setup, and technical troubleshooting
* Security system installation, including CCTV and related devices
* E-commerce store setup, delivery integration, and digital marketing tools
* Supply of ICT equipment such as computers, phones, and networking accessories
Additional information
Workio is available on the Google Play Store under the company’s name, confirming its developer attribution. Public business listings confirm the company’s registration and address in Port Harcourt, Rivers State.
